HTMLTextAreaElementAutocomplete.summary: The autocomplete property of the interface indicates whether the value of the control can be automatically completed by the browser. It reflects the <textarea> element's autocomplete attribute.

remarks.para:
-textarea
-HTML autocomplete attribute
-ARIA aria-autocomplete attribute
-Turning off autocompletion

HTMLTextAreaElementAutocomplete.value: A string representing the value of the autocomplete attribute ("on", "off", or a <token-list>) or the empty string ("") if unspecified.
